sentences.sContent: ...fungi that have a symbiotic relationship with the trees of these northwestern forests.
sentences.sCn: ...与这些位于西北部的森林里的树木存在共生关系的真菌。

remMethod.val: sym(共同) + bio(生命) + tic → 享有共同的生命 → 共生的

words.tran: [生态] 共生；合作关系；共栖

trans.tranOther: a symbiotic relationship is one in which the people, organizations, or living things involved depend on each other
